channel.title: Stuck on starting
channel.description:
#### What happened? The game was stuck on starting. I was with a live streamer, so when I checked the stream, it took a while for the starting screen to go away, but it eventually did. There were also a number of people with one of the default random names. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? For it to simply continue onto the name selection screen. #### Steps to reproduce: Start a game? I'm not certain on the exact requirements.
#### Comments: A side-by-side image of the stream and my game: https://imgur.com/a/ugD7g Sorry about the darkness on the stream, I got the image in the middle of a transition and by the time I realised, the streamer lost internet connection. Also, no, I was not stream sniping, I only checked the stream when I realised nothing was loading. the stream was paused until then

item.title: Stuck on starting
item.dc:creator: TheButterMage
item.description:
What happened?

The game was stuck on starting. I was with a live streamer, so when I checked the stream, it took a while for the starting screen to go away, but it eventually did. There were also a number of people with one of the default random names.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

For it to simply continue onto the name selection screen.

Steps to reproduce:

Start a game? Iâ€™m not certain on the exact requirements.

Comments:

A side-by-side image of the stream and my game: https://imgur.com/a/ugD7g
Sorry about the darkness on the stream, I got the image in the middle of a transition and by the time I realised, the streamer lost internet connection. Also, no, I was not stream sniping, I only checked the stream when I realised nothing was loading. the stream was paused until then
